app: 海康威视SPON IP网络对讲广播系统
seo: 海康威视,SPON,IP网络对讲广播系统,命令执行漏洞,CVE-2023-6895
seo_en: Hikvision,SPON,IP Network Intercom Broadcast System,Command Execution Vulnerability,CVE-2023-6895
summary: 该插件用于检测海康威视SPON IP网络对讲广播系统是否存在命令执行漏洞（CVE-2023-6895），通过发送特定请求验证系统是否可被利用执行命令。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Hikvision SPON IP Network Intercom Broadcast System has a command execution vulnerability (CVE-2023-6895). It verifies if the system can be exploited to execute commands by sending specific requests.
